title: [I/A] King’s Raid #24 佛心營運送石送不停 唔洗刷首抽仲唔快啲一齊黎玩

replies.msg:
Sever【Asia】
需入公會嘅



King`s Raid(簡稱KR)
橫向類型遊戲
戰鬥畫面打擊感強，角色精美
技能、職業種類多各有用途
玩家可以組合屬於自己既隊伍



ANDROID
https://apps.qoo-app.com/app/4943

IOS
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/kings-raid/id1097735195

已經收到由 香港 巴打提供嘅美國AC
如有需要借用可以聯絡


所以攻略僅供參考
麻煩各巴絲睇完都理性分折一下
其他無推薦到嘅英依然可以玩
冷門唔代表廢
依隻驚最好玩嘅喺組合
零課麻煩唔好跟風推薦玩乜就跟乜
到時唔夠材料先嚟棄
然後RAID撞到啪啪聲
完

【LIHKG】King's Raid 新手入門
【最新收錄 底起被起 巴打嘅完美材料攻略】


【LIHKG】King’s Raid 各職專武繁中翻譯


【LIHKG】King’s Raid 全人物覺醒表 v1.2【繁中版】


【LIHKG】King’s Raid 英雄評價表【連登版】


【King’s Raid】 各英詳細介紹表(包括技能T1-5點法、裝備屬性、符文等)


Q: 2,3,5星券揀咩角色好呀?(5星為活動券,通常係活動期間登入夠7日就有,每日重置時間為香港時間零晨1點)
A:隊形一般會選擇1坦2輸出1奶
2星券,紅框為首選(Gau係戰士,可做坦可做物理輸出,Kaulah為牧師,用途較廣)


3星券,紅框為冇活動5星券既首選DPS,紫框為有活動5星券首選多控場副DPS,綠框為有活動5星券可選角色


5星券,紅框為首選DPS,綠框為次選DPS


講就講曬,仲有選擇困難既就問你自己細佬啦

Q:咁其他角色呢?唔揀係咪即係廢?
A:唔係,大部分角色都有各自既用途同玩法,有D係打龍勁,有D係PVP勁,有D係打BOSS勁,有D係推圖勁,仲有分前期角同後期角,不過玩耐左就會明,只係開頭揀勁既DPS黎用姐

Q:我個隊應該點配呀?
A:一隊入面一般配置就係1坦2輸出1奶,其中一個輸出會係拎黎控場(控場技能即係CC)用既副DPS,因為控場可以打斷敵人既技能,例如係敵人吟唱時間你暈佢,佢就冇得出依招技,係PVP黎講甚至會令對手冇埋Mana(Mana=出技cost),進而令你較容易獲勝

Q：需唔需要刷首抽架？
A：冇首抽依回事，角色可以用自選卷,用石買同係酒館到溝返黎，專武就每日免費抽都有機會中

Q：咩英好用？
Ａ：評價表：https://goo.gl/KRzAey
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YfHeybcKj3R3Qq6Tzg1nJFiH9OYAcOxHD3WIJxBhrPk/edit

Q：D武器裝備點搞啊？點分？
A：專武T10(得武器有專武 - 一開始會送男劍專武一把)
金(RAID/商店金抽/紅石抽)
紅(主線HARD/HELL MODE/RAID/商店金抽/紅石抽)
紫(主線HARD/HELL MODE/RAID/商店金抽/紅石抽)
藍(分解)
綠白(分解)

Q：卡主線點搞？
A：試下睇一次自動打，咩原因卡先
如果喺唔夠力嘅就升下角升下裝
如果喺死喺Boss出技嘅話可以等隻王出技嘅時候出CC技斷佢

Q：幾LV封頂？
Ａ：80，英雄1至80級所需經驗 https://goo.gl/ZTSaJj

如有更多問題可詳見【LIHKG】King's Raid 新手入門【By湯丸】或回覆
即有專人回答您
第一Set萬聖節Skin

Period: 19th Oct after maintenance – 26th Oct before maintenance
** Please note that the event period may be changed if the maintenance schedule changes.

Details: Clear Daily Quests to acquire rewards

- Use 3 Stockade Keys
- Use 3 Upper Dungeon Tickets
- Use 3 Ancient Royal Vault Keys
- Clear Conquest 3 times
- Use 3 Arena Tickets

:: Don’t forget these maps reset at every midnight
** Please aware that battles before the event do not count.

Rewards
::
Once you clear Daily Quests:
:: You will be able to acquire 3 kinds of Fragments (30 Fragments each, total 90 fragments)
for each class

- Day 1 (Knight): Fragment of Justice, Strategy, Patience x30 each
- Day 2 (Warrior): Fragment of Justice, Force, Fortune x30 each
- Day 3 (Assassin): Fragment of Wisdom, Patience, Fortune x30 each
- Day 4 (Archer): Fragment of Force, Strategy, Harmony x30 each
- Day 5 (Mechanic): Fragment of Wisdom, Strategy, Fortune x30 each
- Day 6 (Wizard): Fragment of Force, Wisdom, Harmony x30 each
- Day 7 (Priest): Fragment of Justice, Patience, Harmony x30 each

If you clear all 7 days, you will get

:: Fragment of Infinity x777!

** The event resets at every midnight
** You can acquire/use points until 23:59:59
** You must claim the reward mail to achieve the quest of the day.
** Rewards will be sent directly to your mailbox.

[Event] Halloween Dungeon (Revised)



‘Halloween Dungeon’ event will begin after the maintenance on 19th Oct 2017.

Please refer to the details below.

------------------------------------------

Halloween Dungeon!! Event!!

Period: 19th Oct after maintenance – 9th Nov before maintenance
** Please note that the event period may be changed if the maintenance schedule changes.

Details::
- Halloween theme Orvel during the event period



- You can enter the event dungeon via May’s General Shop.



- You have to use Event Dungeon Keys to enter the dungeon. You can acquire 1 Event
Dungeon Key by consuming 200 Stamina.
:: 5 Event Dungeon Keys will be charged every day. You can also recharge them
through quests.
:: You can also recharge keys by using rubies.
:: 5 Event Dungeon Keys will be charged at every midnight. If you already have more than
5 keys, keys won’t be recharged.
ex) If you have 10/5 Keys, you will still have 10/5 keys next day.

- Another storyline will be added in the Halloween Dungeon

- Halloween Event Dungeon has 3 types of difficulties; Easy, Normal, Hard.
You can open the next difficulty by clearing previous one.

- You will acquire Event Points upon clearing event dungeons.
The more difficult stage you play, the more points you will get.



** Acquired points will vanish when the event ends.



:: Stage 1 Boss - Mummy Jane
:: Stage 2 Boss - R.R. Hood Tanya
:: Stage 3 Boss - Ghost Knight Ricardo
:: Stage 4 Boss - Clown Lakrak
:: Stage 5 Boss - Q. of Hearts Cassandra
:: Stage 6 Boss - Vampire Nyx



- You can use acquire Event Points to purchase items in May’s Halloween Shop.

- Halloween Ghost Box Item List



- Halloween Jack-O'-Lantern Box Item List



▶2 kinds of Artifacts that you can acquire from Halloween Jack-O’-Lantern Box

- Cross Pumpkin Head (Artifact)
:: All DMG taken is reduced by 10% and deal 10% more DMG to enemies.

- Angry Pumpkin Head (Artifact)
:: Max HP is increased by 20% and deal P.DMG worth 2% of Max HP to all nearby enemies
within a small range.
